        "$:/plugins/tgrosinger/tw5-checklist/stylesheet": {
            "title": "$:/plugins/tgrosinger/tw5-checklist/stylesheet",
            "tags": "$:/tags/Stylesheet",
            "text": "ul.checklist {\n    list-style: none;\n    margin: 0;\n    padding: 0;\n}\n\nul.checklist > li {\n    position: relative;\n    width: calc(100% - 1em);\n}\n\n\n/* input form */\n\n.checklist-newitem-icon::before {\n    content: \"&#x270e;\";\n}\n\ninput.checklist-newitem {\n    margin-left: 1em;\n    margin-bottom: 0.75em;\n    padding: 2px;\n    border: none;\n    border-bottom: solid 2px <<colour sidebar-tab-background>>;\n    transition: border 0.3s;\n    width: calc(100% - 2em - 20px);\n}\n\ninput:focus.checklist-newitem {\n    border-bottom: solid 2px <<colour notification-border>>;\n}\n\n\n/* placeholder text */\n\n::-webkit-input-placeholder { \n  color: #444;\n  font-style: italic;\n}\n::-moz-placeholder { \n  color: #444;\n  font-style: italic;\n}\n:-ms-input-placeholder { \n  color: #444;\n  font-style: italic;\n}\n:-moz-placeholder { \n  color: #444;\n  font-style: italic;\n}\n::placeholder {\n  color: #444;\n  font-style: italic;\n}\n\n\n/* list items content */\n\n.checklist li input[type=\"checkbox\"] {\n    vertical-align: top;\n    margin-top: 4px;\n}\n\n.checklist label {\n    display: inline-block;\n    position: relative;\n    margin-left: -1em;\n    padding-left: 0.4em;\n    left: 1.4em;\n    width: calc(100% - 2em - 20px);\n}\n\n.checklist > li:hover label, \n.checklist input[type=\"checkbox\"]:hover + button + label, \n.checklist input[type=\"checkbox\"]:focus + button + label  {\n    background-color: <<colour sidebar-tab-background>>;\n}\n\ninput:checked + .checklist-remove + label {\n    opacity: 0.5;\n}\n\n.checklist li input + .checklist-remove:hover + label,\n.checklist li input + .checklist-remove:focus + label  {\n    background-color:  rgba(255,0,0,0.25);\n    opacity: 0.8;\n    border-radius: 5px;\n}\n\n/* strike checked items only if set in user configuration */\n<$list filter=\"[[$:/plugins/tgrosinger/tw5-checklist/Configuration]field:strike-checked[true]]\">\ninput:checked + .checklist-remove + label {\n    text-decoration: line-through;\n}\n</$list>\n\n\n/* buttons */\n\nbutton.checklist-add {\n    position: relative;\n    left: 0.75em;\n    width: 18px;\n    height: 18px;\n    border-radius: 5px;\nbackground-image: url('data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg%22%20width%3D%2211%22%20height%3D%2211%22%3E%0A%3Crect%20width%3D%221%22%20height%3D%227%22%20x%3D%225%22%20y%3D%222%22%20fill%3D%22%239B9B9B%22%2F%3E%0A%3Crect%20width%3D%227%22%20height%3D%221%22%20x%3D%222%22%20y%3D%225%22%20fill%3D%22%239B9B9B%22%2F%3E%0A%3C%2Fsvg%3E');\n    background-size: 100%;\n}\n\nbutton.checklist-add:hover, button.checklist-add:focus {\n    background-color: <<colour sidebar-tab-background>>;\n}\n\nbutton.checklist-remove {\n    display: block;\n    position: absolute;\n    top: 2px;\n    right: -6px;\n    width: 18px;\n    height: 18px;\n    border-radius: 5px;\n    color: <<colour sidebar-muted-foreground>>;\nbackground-image: url('data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg%22%20width%3D%2211%22%20height%3D%2211%22%3E%0A%3Crect%20width%3D%225%22%20height%3D%221%22%20x%3D%223%22%20y%3D%225%22%20fill%3D%22%23444%22%2F%3E%0A%3C%2Fsvg%3E');\n    background-size: 100%;\n/*    background-color: <<colour sidebar-tab-background-selected>>; */\n    border: 1px solid <<colour sidebar-tab-background>>;\n}\n\nul.checklist > li:hover button.checklist-remove {\n    color: <<colour sidebar-muted-foreground-hover>>;\n}\n\nbutton.checklist-remove:hover,\nbutton.checklist-remove:focus {\n    color:  <<colour dirty-indicator>>;\n    background-color: <<colour sidebar-tab-background>>;\n}\n\nbutton.checklist-clearall {\n    margin-top: 0.75em;\n}\n\nbutton.checklist-clearall::before {\n    content: \"↻ \";\n}\n\n\n/* visualliy hidden, accessible for screen reader */\n\n.checklist-vh {\n    position: absolute !important;\n    clip: rect(1px, 1px, 1px, 1px);\n    padding:0 !important;\n    border:0 !important;\n    height: 1px !important;\n    width: 1px !important;\n    overflow: hidden;\n}\n"
        },
        "$:/plugins/tgrosinger/tw5-checklist/Usage": {
            "title": "$:/plugins/tgrosinger/tw5-checklist/Usage",
            "text": "! Creating a New Checklist\n\nThis plugin provides a wikitext rule for use in normal wikitext tiddlers. A\nchecklist is defined as two brackets with either a <kbd>space</kbd> or an\n<kbd>x</kbd> between them.\n\n```\n! My Shopping List\n\n[ ] Milk\n[ ] Eggs\n[x] Bread\n\n```\n\n!! Multiple Checklists\n\nThere is no need to declare an instance of a checklist, and you can place\nchecklist items throughout a tiddler. Each set of consecutive (single new-line\ndelimited) checklist items will be displayed as a single checklist.\n\n```\n! My first list\n\n[ ] Item 1\n[x] Item 2\n\n! My second list\n\n[x] Item 3\n[x] Item 4\n\n```\n\n!! List Item Formatting\n\nList items support any inline formatting rules. This means you can create links,\nbold, or anything else found on the\n[[Formatting in WikiText|http://tiddlywiki.com/static/Formatting%2520in%2520WikiText.html]] guide.\n\n! Configuration\n\nPlease see [[the configuration|$:/plugins/tgrosinger/tw5-checklist/Configuration]]\npage to learn about and adjust configuration options.\n"
        }
    }
}






Please see the [[homepage|https://grosinger.net/tw5-checklist/]] for more information on the options.

Save and reload the wiki to activate changes.

<table>
  <tr>
    <th align="left">Rearrange checked items:</th>
    <td>
        <$checkbox field="move-checked" tiddler="$:/plugins/tgrosinger/tw5-checklist/Configuration"
            checked="true" unchecked="false" default="true"></$checkbox>
    </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <th align="left" class="rerendering-required">Strike checked items: </th>
    <td>
        <$checkbox field="strike-checked" tiddler="$:/plugins/tgrosinger/tw5-checklist/Configuration"
            checked="true" unchecked="false" default="true"></$checkbox>
    </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <th align="left" class="rerendering-required">Sort list alphabetically: </th>
    <td>
        <$checkbox field="sort-alphabetically" tiddler="$:/plugins/tgrosinger/tw5-checklist/Configuration"
            checked="true" unchecked="false" default="false"></$checkbox>
    </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <th align="left" class="rerendering-required">Show Clear-All: </th>
    <td>
        <$checkbox field="show-clearall" tiddler="$:/plugins/tgrosinger/tw5-checklist/Configuration"
            checked="true" unchecked="false" default="true"></$checkbox>
    </td>
  </tr>
</table>

&#42; make a change in a list to see the effect (check/uncheck or add/delete an item).

<style>
.rerendering-required:after {
    content: ' *';
    color: #e32;
}
</style>







CSS Construction Set for&nbsp;~TiddlyWiki&nbsp;5






[[Bricks]]






\define swatchTitle()
$(colour)$: $(realColour)$
\end
\define swatchStyle()
background-color: $(realColour)$;
\end
\define swatch()
<$set name="swatchColour" value={{##$(colour)$}} >
<$wikify name="realColour" text="<$macrocall $name=coloraction color=<<swatchColour>>/>">
<div class="tc-swatch" style=<<swatchStyle>> title=<<swatchTitle>>/>
</$wikify>
</$set>
\end
<div class="tc-swatches-horiz"><$list filter="
foreground
background
muted-foreground
primary
page-background
tab-background
tiddler-info-background
" variable="colour"><<swatch>></$list></div>






<$linkcatcher to="$:/palette">
<div class="tc-chooser"><$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/Palette]sort[name]]"><$set name="cls" filter="[all[current]prefix{$:/palette}]" value="tc-chooser-item tc-chosen" emptyValue="tc-chooser-item"><div class=<<cls>>><$link to={{!!title}}><div>''<$view field="name" format="text"/>'' - <$view field="description" format="text"/></div>{{||$:/snippets/currpalettepreview}}</$link>
</div></$set>
</$list>
</div>
</$linkcatcher>

\define getDataUri(img:"$:/favicon.ico")

\end

<$vars target="""$:/themes/telmiger/bricks/wikilogic""">
<div class="lr-tag-popup">
<$set name="add-tags-filter" value="""[list[$:/temp/lr-tags-$:/themes/telmiger/bricks/wikilogic!!lr-tagsinlist]sort[]] -[list[$:/temp/lr-tags-$:/themes/telmiger/bricks/wikilogic!!lr-tagstoremove]]""">
<$set name="has-add-tags" value="""[list[$:/temp/lr-tags-$:/themes/telmiger/bricks/wikilogic!!lr-tagsinlist]sort[]] -[list[$:/temp/lr-tags-$:/themes/telmiger/bricks/wikilogic!!lr-tagstoremove]] +[limit[1]]""">
<$list filter=<<has-add-tags>>>
<<telang Add-tags-from-the-list>>
<$wikify name="tt" text=<<telang Add-tag>>>
<ul class="lr-tags-add">
<$list filter=<<add-tags-filter>> variable="tag">
<li>
   <$macrocall $name="teBtnTagAddRemove" btntext=<<tag>> add=<<tag>> tiddler=<<target>> tooltip=<<tt>>/> 
</li>
</$list>
</ul>
</$wikify>
</$list>
</$set>
</$set>
<$set name="remove-tags-filter" value="""[list[$:/temp/lr-tags-$:/themes/telmiger/bricks/wikilogic!!lr-tagstoremove]sort[]] -[[]]""">
<$set name="has-remove-tags" value="""[list[$:/temp/lr-tags-$:/themes/telmiger/bricks/wikilogic!!lr-tagstoremove]sort[]] -[[]] +[limit[1]]""">
<$list filter=<<has-remove-tags>>>
<<telang Remove-tags?>> 
<$wikify name="tt" text=<<telang Are-you-sure?>>>
<ul class="lr-tags-remove">
<$list filter=<<remove-tags-filter>> variable="tag">
<li>
   <$macrocall $name="teBtnTagAddRemove" btntext=<<tag>> remove=<<tag>> tiddler=<<target>> tooltip=<<tt>>/> 
</li>
</$list>
</ul>
</$wikify>
</$list>
</$set>
</$set>

</div>
</$vars>

\define lingo-base() $:/language/ThemeTweaks/

!! Bricks: <<lingo Settings>>

|<$link to="$:/themes/telmiger/bricks/metrics/fontsize"><<lingo Metrics/FontSize>></$link> |<$edit-text tiddler="$:/themes/telmiger/bricks/metrics/fontsize" default="" tag="input"/> | default: 12pt |
|<$link to="$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/settings/codefontfamily"><<lingo Settings/CodeFontFamily>></$link> |<$edit-text tiddler="$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/settings/codefontfamily" default="" tag="input"/> | |
|<$link to="$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/settings/editorfontfamily"><<lingo Settings/EditorFontFamily>></$link> |<$edit-text tiddler="$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/settings/editorfontfamily" default="" tag="input"/> | |

{{$:/apps/telmiger/bricks/paletteeditor}}

<!-- 

|<$link to="$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/settings/fontfamily"><<lingo Settings/FontFamily>></$link> |<$edit-text tiddler="$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/settings/fontfamily" default="" tag="input"/> | |
|<$link to="$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/settings/editorfontfamily"><<lingo Settings/EditorFontFamily>></$link> |<$edit-text tiddler="$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/settings/editorfontfamily" default="" tag="input"/> | |

\define lingo-base() $:/language/ControlPanel/

Drag in tag popup to order: <<tag $:/tags/TopRightBar>>

---

<$checkbox tiddler="$:/themes/telmiger/bricks/hide/sidebar-search.css" tag="$:/tags/Stylesheet"> Hide standard sidebar search</$checkbox>

---

<$set name="tv-config-toolbar-icons" value="yes">

<$set name="tv-config-toolbar-text" value="yes">

<$set name="tv-config-toolbar-class" value="">

<$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/PageControls]!has[draft.of]]" variable="listItem">

<div style="position:relative;" class={{{ [<listItem>encodeuricomponent[]addprefix[tc-btn-]] }}}>

<$checkbox tiddler=<<listItem>> tag="$:/tags/TopRightBar"/> <$transclude tiddler=<<listItem>>/> <i class="tc-muted"><$transclude tiddler=<<listItem>> field="description"/></i>

</div>

</$list>

</$set>

</$set>

</$set>







\rules only filteredtranscludeinline transcludeinline macrodef macrocallinline macrocallblock

/* Prevent iOS text size adjust after orientation change, 
   without disabling user zoom. */

html {
  -ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;
  -webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;
}

/* Box sizing from tachyons.io + input[type="search"] */

html, body, div, article, section, main, footer, header, form, fieldset, legend, pre, code, p, a, h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, ul, ol, li, dl, dt, dd, textarea, input[type="email"], input[type="number"], input[type="password"], input[type="search"], input[type="tel"], input[type="text"], input[type="url"], .border-box { 
box-sizing: border-box;
max-width: 100%;
}


/*
** No more normalize CSS reset - we differ from TW vanilla here
** see http://getbem.com/faq/#global-css-resets for reasons
*/


/* Basic element styles */

html {
	text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; /* Enables kerning and ligatures etc. */
	-webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;
	-moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale;
}

html:-webkit-full-screen {
	background-color: <<colour page-background>>;
}

body {
	<<.lh-copy>>
	<<.helvetica>>
   font-family: "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Segoe UI", Arial, sans-serif, "Apple Color Emoji", "Segoe UI Emoji", "Segoe UI Symbol";
	-moz-tab-size: 3;
	tab-size: 3;
}

body.tc-body {
	word-wrap: break-word;
	overflow-wrap: break-word;
	color: <<colour foreground>>;
	fill: <<colour foreground>>;
	background-color: <<colour page-background>>;
/* 	<<custom-background-datauri>> */
}


/* Links */

a {
	overflow-wrap: break-word;
	word-wrap: break-word;
	display: inline-block;
	vertical-align: top;
}

@media (<<--breakpoint-not-small>>) {
	a {
		display: unset;
		vertical-align: unset;
	}
}


/* Code */

pre { /* tachyons.io */
	overflow-x: auto;
	overflow-y: hidden;
	overflow: scroll;
}

pre, code {
	<<.code>>
	<<.br2>>
	white-space: pre-wrap;
}

pre {
	display: block;
	word-break: normal;
	word-wrap: break-word;
	<<.pv1>> <<.ph2>>
	<<.ba>>
	border-color: <<colour pre-border>>;
	background-color: <<colour pre-background>>;
}

code {
	<<.ph1>>
	<<.ba>>
	border-color: <<colour code-border>>;
	color: <<colour code-foreground>>;
	background-color: <<colour code-background>>;
}

pre > code { 
	<<.bn>>
	<<.pa0>>
	background-color: transparent;
	color: inherit;
}


/* definitions */

dl dt {
	font-weight: bold;
	margin-top: 6px;
}


/* HRs */

hr {
	height: 1px;
	<<.mv4>>
	border: none;
	background-color: <<colour tab-border>>;
}

.tc-drop-down hr {
	margin-bottom: 0.5em;
	margin-top: 0.5em;
}







/* TW stuff */

.tc-muted {
	color: <<colour muted-foreground>>;
}

.tc-sidebar-scrollable .tc-muted {
	color: <<colour sidebar-controls-foreground>>;
}

.tc-icon-wrapper > svg, 
.tc-image-button, .tc-image-button svg {
	height: <<--image-button-height>>;
	width: <<--image-button-width>>;
}

.tc-tiddler-frame img,
.tc-tiddler-frame svg,

.tc-tiddler-frame embed,
.tc-tiddler-frame iframe {
	max-width: 100%;
}

.tc-tiddler-body > iframe {
	width: 100%;
	height: 600px;
}

** File inputs
*/

.tc-file-input-wrapper {
	position: relative;
	overflow: hidden;
	display: inline-block;
	vertical-align: middle;
}

.tc-file-input-wrapper input[type=file] {
	position: absolute;
	top: 0;
	left: 0;
	right: 0;
	bottom: 0;
	font-size: 999px;
	max-width: 100%;
	max-height: 100%;
	filter: alpha(opacity=0);
	opacity: 0;
	outline: none;
	background: white;
	cursor: pointer;
	display: inline-block;
}

	display: none;
}

/*
** Page layout – mobile first
** inspired by TW vanilla
** """ 
*/

body {
	<<.ma0>>
}

.tc-page-container {
}

.tc-story-river {
	position: relative;
	<<.pa0>>
}

@media (<<--breakpoint-not-small>>) {
	.tc-story-river {
		<<.pa3>>
	}
}

@media (<<--breakpoint-medium>>) {
	.tc-story-river {
		<<.pa4>>
	}
}

@media (<<--breakpoint-large>>) {
	.tc-story-river {
		margin-right: calc(<<--sidebar-width>> + <<--spacing-m>>);
		margin-left: auto;
	}
}


/* site title */

.tc-sidebar-header .tc-site-title {
	<<.ma0>>
	<<.mt4>>
}

.tc-site-subtitle {
  <<.mb4>>
}


/* sidebar */

.tc-sidebar-scrollable {
	position: fixed;
	top: 0;
	right: 0;
	bottom: 0;
	left: auto;
	z-index: 1500;
	width: auto;
	max-width: calc(100% - <<--spacing-l>> - <<--spacing-m>>);
	max-height: 100%;
	animation: inherit;
	<<.shadow-5-dark ->>
}

.tc-sidebar-header {
	<<.mt0>>
	overflow-y: auto;
	overflow-x: hidden;
	-webkit-overflow-scrolling: touch;
}

.tc-sidebar-header > .tc-reveal {
	width: calc(<<--sidebar-width>> - <<--spacing-l>> - <<--spacing-s>>);
	max-width: 100%;
	<<.pt2>> <<.pb4>> <<.pl3>>
	<<.mb4>>
}


/* extend layout */

@media (<<--breakpoint-not-small>>) {

.tc-sidebar-header > .tc-reveal {
	width: 100%;
	<<.pt3>> <<.pb4>> <<.pl3>>
	<<.ml3>>
 }

.tc-sidebar-scrollable {
	max-width: calc(100% - <<--spacing-xl>>);
 }

}


@media (<<--breakpoint-medium>>) {

html[dir="rtl"] .tc-sidebar-scrollable {
	right: auto;
 }

.tc-sidebar-header > .tc-reveal {
	width: <<--sidebar-width>>;
 }

.tc-tiddler-frame {
	margin-right: calc(66vw - <<--sidebar-width>>);
 }

}

@media (<<--breakpoint-large>>) {

.tc-sidebar-header > .tc-reveal {
	<<.pb5>>
	<<.mb5>>
 }

.tc-tiddler-frame {
	margin-right: auto;
	margin-left: auto;
 }
}


/* End """ */

{ <<.mt4>> }

{ <<.mt4>> }

   <<.mh2>>

   <<.ml0>>

  color: <<colour primary>>;
}

	background-color: <<colour table-header-background>>;
	border-color: <<colour table-footer-background>>;
}

	cursor:default;
}

	position: relative;
	content: "&#x2003;"; /* emspace */
<$wikify name=color text="<<colour foreground>>">
<$wikify name="bg" text="""url(data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg%22%20width%3D%22100%22%20height%3D%22100%22%3E%3Ccircle%20cx%3D%2250%22%20cy%3D%2250%22%20r%3D%2245%22%20fill%3D%22<$list filter="[<color>] +[ encodeuricomponent[]]"/>%22%2F%3E%3C%2Fsvg%3E);""">
      background: <<bg>>
</$wikify>
</$wikify>
   background-size: .66rem;
   background-repeat: no-repeat;
   background-position-y: .33rem;
}

   background: <<colour select-tag-background>>;

    width: 100%;

		left: auto;

	}

/*
** Page Controls
** (c) Thomas Elmiger 
** """ 
*/

/* usually in the sidebar */

.tc-page-controls {
	<<.f3>>
   <<.lh-copy>>
	<<.mb3>>
}

.tc-page-controls button {
	<<.mr3>>
}

.tc-page-controls button.tc-selected svg  {
	fill: <<colour sidebar-controls-foreground-hover>>;
}

.tc-page-controls button.tc-selected:hover svg  {
	fill: <<colour sidebar-controls-foreground>>;
}

.tc-page-controls a.tc-tiddlylink:hover {
	text-decoration: none;
}

.tc-page-controls img {
	width: <<--image-button-width>>;
}

.tc-page-controls svg {
	fill: <<colour sidebar-controls-foreground>>;
}

.tc-page-controls button:hover svg,
.tc-page-controls a:hover svg {
	fill: <<colour sidebar-controls-foreground-hover>>;
}

/* End """ */






/*
** Plugin info
** inspired by TW vanilla
** """ 
*/


/* nicht übernommen 

.tc-plugin-info {
	margin: 0.5em 0 0.5em 0;
}

.tc-plugin-info-chunk.tc-plugin-info-toggle img, .tc-plugin-info-chunk.tc-plugin-info-toggle svg {
	width: 1em;
	height: 1em;
}

.tc-plugin-info-chunk.tc-plugin-info-icon img, .tc-plugin-info-chunk.tc-plugin-info-icon svg {
	width: 2em;
	height: 2em;
}

*/


/* bisher */

.tc-plugin-info {
	display: flex;
   align-items: center;
	<<.ba>>
	border-color: <<colour muted-foreground>>;
	<<.mb3>>
	<<.pa1>>
	fill: <<colour muted-foreground>>;
	background-color: <<colour background>>;
}

.tc-plugin-info-disabled {
	background: -webkit-repeating-linear-gradient(45deg, rgba(255,255,0,.25), rgba(255,255,0,.25) 60px, transparent 60px, transparent 70px);
	background: repeating-linear-gradient(45deg, rgba(255,255,0,0.25), rgba(255,255,0,0.25) 60px, transparent 60px, transparent 70px);
}

.tc-plugin-info-disabled:hover {
	background: -webkit-repeating-linear-gradient(45deg, rgba(0,0,0,.1), rgba(0,0,0,.1) 60px, transparent 60px, transparent 70px);
	background: repeating-linear-gradient(45deg, rgba(0,0,0,0.1), rgba(0,0,0,0.1) 60px, transparent 60px, transparent 70px);
}

a.tc-tiddlylink.tc-plugin-info:hover {
	text-decoration: none;
	background-color: <<colour primary>>;
	color: <<colour background>>;
	fill: <<colour foreground>>;
}

a.tc-tiddlylink.tc-plugin-info:hover .tc-plugin-info > .tc-plugin-info-chunk > svg {
	fill: <<colour foreground>>;
}


.tc-plugin-info-chunk {
   <<.ma01>>
	vertical-align: middle;
}

.tc-plugin-info-chunk.tc-plugin-info-toggle {
	flex-grow: 0;
	flex-shrink: 0;
	line-height: 1;
}

.tc-plugin-info-chunk.tc-plugin-info-icon {
	flex-grow: 0;
	flex-shrink: 0;
	line-height: 1;
}

.tc-plugin-info-chunk.tc-plugin-info-description {
	flex-grow: 1;
}

.tc-plugin-info-chunk.tc-plugin-info-buttons {
	flex-grow: 0;
	flex-shrink: 0;
	<<.f6>>
	line-height: 1.2;
	text-align: right;
}

.tc-plugin-info .tc-plugin-info-chunk h1 {
	<<.f5>>
	<<.mv1>>
}

	<<.f6>>
	<<.mt0>>
	<<.mb1>>
}

	<<.f6>>
	<<.mb1>>
}

    <<.mh2>>
}

	fill: <<colour background>>;
}

	width: 2em;
	height: 2em;
	fill: <<colour muted-foreground>>;
	<<.pr3>>
}

	width: 2em;
	height: 2em;
	fill: <<colour foreground>>;
}

	<<.f6>>
	cursor: pointer;
	color: <<colour tab-foreground>>;
	<<.lh-copy>>
	<<.pv1>> <<.ph2>>
	<<.mb0>> <<.ml0>> <<.mr0>>
	font-weight: 300;
	background: inherit;
	background-color: <<colour tab-background>>;
	<<.ba>>
	<<.br2>>
	<<.br--top>>
	border-color: <<colour tab-border>>;

	height: 2rem;
}

	<<.bt>>
	height: 1px;
	margin-top: 1px;
	border-color: <<colour tab-border>>;
}

.tc-tab-content {
	<<.pt4>>
}


/* horizontal */

	<<.ml2 ->>
   max-width: calc(100vw - 1rem)
}

	<<.ml2>>
}

	margin-top: -2px;
	margin-bottom: -2px;
	<<.ml1>>
}

.tc-tab-set:not(.tc-vertical) > .tc-tab-buttons button:first-of-type {
	<<.ml0>>
}

.tc-tab-set:not(.tc-vertical) > .tc-tab-content {
	<<.pl2>>
}


/* vertical */

.tc-tab-content.tc-vertical  {
	display: inline-block;
	vertical-align: top;
	<<.pt3>>
	<<.pl3>>
	<<.bl>>
	border-color: <<colour tab-border>>;
	-webkit-flex: 1 0 70%;
	flex: 1 0 70%;
	max-width: 75%;
   overflow: auto;
}

.tc-tab-divider.tc-vertical  {
	display: none;
}

.tc-tab-set.tc-vertical {
	display: -webkit-flex;
	display: flex;
}

.tc-tab-buttons.tc-vertical  {
	z-index: 100;
	display: block;
	vertical-align: top;
	text-align: right;
	<<.ml0>>
	margin-right: -1px;
	max-width: 33%;
	-webkit-flex: 0 0 auto;
	flex: 0 0 auto;
}

.tc-tab-buttons.tc-vertical button,
.tc-tab-buttons.tc-vertical button.tc-tab-selected {
	display: block;
	width: 100%;
	<<.mt0>> <<.mr0>> <<.mb1>>
	text-align: right;
	<<.ba>>
	<<.br2>>
	<<.br--left>>
	border-color: <<colour tab-border>>;
	background-color: <<colour tab-background>>;
}


/* selected */

.tc-tab-buttons button.tc-tab-selected {
	color: <<colour tab-foreground-selected>>;
	<<.ba>>
	border-color: <<colour tab-border-selected>>;
	background-color: <<colour tab-background-selected>>;
	border-bottom-color: <<colour tiddler-background>>;
}

	<<.bb>>
	border-bottom-color: <<colour tiddler-info-tab-background>>;
	background-color: <<colour tiddler-info-tab-background>>;
}

/* selected vertical */

.tc-tab-buttons.tc-vertical button.tc-tab-selected {
	border-right-color: <<colour tab-background-selected>>;
	background-color: <<colour tab-background-selected>>;
}


/* Deactivate selected tab */

.tc-tab-buttons button.tc-tab-selected {
	cursor: default;
	pointer-events: none;
}

	display: inline-block;
	width: 0.5em;
}

}

}

	display: inline-block;
	width: auto;
	margin-bottom: 0px;
	<<.br--top>>
}

	<<.bb>>
	border-bottom-color: <<colour dropdown-tab-background-selected>>;
	background-color: <<colour dropdown-tab-background-selected>>;
}

	flex-grow: 1;

	flex-basis: unset;
 }

	order: 70;
}
.tc-tiddler-frame > .tc-reveal:nth-of-type(2) {
	order: 60;
	flex-grow: 2;
}
.tc-tiddler-frame > .tc-reveal:nth-of-type(3) {
	order: 50;
}


/* End """ */






/*
** Tiddler Controls (buttons)
** (c) Thomas Elmiger
** """ 
*/

.tc-tiddler-frame .tc-tiddler-controls {
   display: block;
   width: 100%;
   text-align: right;
   <<.f3>>
}

.tc-tiddler-controls .tc-drop-down,
.tc-tiddler-controls .tc-drop-down .tc-drop-down {
   <<.f4>>
}

.tc-tiddler-controls > span > button,
.tc-tiddler-controls > span > span > button,
.tc-tiddler-controls > span > span > span > button {
	vertical-align: baseline;
	<<.ml2>>
}


@media (<<--breakpoint-not-small>>) {
	.tc-tiddler-frame .tc-tiddler-controls {
      
	}
	.tc-tiddler-controls > span > button {
		<<.ml3>>
	}
}

@media (<<--breakpoint-medium>>) {
	.tc-tiddler-frame .tc-tiddler-controls {
      <<.f2>>
	}
	.tc-tiddler-controls > span > button {
		<<.ml2>>
	}
}

.tc-tiddler-controls button svg, .tc-tiddler-controls button img {
	fill: <<colour tiddler-controls-foreground>>;
}

.tc-tiddler-controls button.tc-selected svg {
	fill: <<colour tiddler-controls-foreground-selected>>;
}

.tc-tiddler-controls button.tc-btn-invisible:hover svg {
	fill: <<colour tiddler-controls-foreground-hover>>;
}


/* user defined colors */

.tc-tiddler-controls button svg.tc-image-info-button {
  fill: <<colour toolbar-info-button>>;
}

.tc-tiddler-controls button svg.tc-image-edit-button {
  fill: <<colour toolbar-edit-button>>;
}

.tc-tiddler-controls button svg.tc-image-close-button {
  fill: <<colour toolbar-close-button>>;
}

.tc-tiddler-controls button svg.tc-image-delete-button {
  fill: <<colour toolbar-delete-button>>;
}

.tc-tiddler-controls button svg.tc-image-cancel-button {
  fill: <<colour toolbar-cancel-button>>;
}

.tc-tiddler-controls button svg.tc-image-done-button {
  fill: <<colour toolbar-done-button>>;
}

.tc-tiddler-controls button svg.tc-image-button {
	height: 0.75em;
}

/* End """ */






/*
** Tiddler Frame
** (c) Thomas Elmiger
** """ 
*/

.tc-tiddler-frame {
	border-color: <<colour tiddler-border>>;
	<<.bb>>
	<<.bw3>>
border: 1px solid black;
}


/* End """ */






/*
** Tiddler Frame
** (c) Thomas Elmiger
** """ 
*/


.tc-tiddler-frame {
	position: relative;
	<<.pa3>>
	<<.mb4>>
	background-color: <<colour tiddler-background>>;
}


@media (<<--breakpoint-not-small>>) {
	.tc-tiddler-frame { <<.pa4>> }
}

@media (<<--breakpoint-medium>>) {
	.tc-tiddler-frame { <<.ph4>> <<.br1>> }

	/* restrict width to readable text width in view mode */
	.tc-tiddler-view-frame {
		max-width: <<--tiddler-view-frame-width>>;
	}
}

@media (<<--breakpoint-large>>) {
	.tc-tiddler-frame {
		<<.ph5>>
		height: auto;
	}
	.tc-tiddler-view-frame {
      width: <<--tiddler-view-frame-width>>;
 	}
}


/* End """ */






/*
** Tiddler Frame flex layout
** (c) Thomas Elmiger
** """ 
*/

.tc-tiddler-frame {
	display: flex;
	flex-direction: row;
	flex-wrap: wrap;
}

@media (<<--breakpoint-large>>) {
	.tc-tiddler-frame {
		align-content: flex-start;
	}
}

/* End """ */

	position: absolute;

}

	position: absolute;
	<<.ml5>>
	line-height: 1;
	<<.measure-narrow>>
}

	width: 100%;
}

	width: 1%; /* as narrow as possible */
	text-align: right;
	font-style: italic;
	font-weight: 200;
}

}

		<<.mt0>> <<.mb1>>

		<<.mt0>> <<.mb3>>

** Optional: Grid debugging
** inspired by tachyons.io
** """

   http://tachyons.io/docs/debug-grid/

   Can be useful for debugging layout issues
   or helping to make sure things line up perfectly.
   Just tack one of these classes onto a parent element.

*/

   color: <<colour diff-delete-foreground>>;

   color: <<colour diff-invisible-foreground>>;

   text-align: right;

** Editor Choosers: Image Chooser, Colour Chooser
** (c) Thomas Elmiger
** """ 
*/

/* Colour chooser */

.tc-colour-chooser a {
	padding: 3px;
	width: 2em;
	height: 2em;
	vertical-align: middle;
}


/* both */

.tc-image-chooser, .tc-colour-chooser {
	white-space: normal;
}

.tc-image-chooser a,
.tc-colour-chooser a {
	display: inline-block;
	vertical-align: top;
	position: relative;
}

.tc-image-chooser a {
	padding: 2px;
	margin: 2px;
	width: 4em;
	height: 4em;
	<<.ba>>
	border-color: <<colour muted-foreground>>;
}

.tc-image-chooser a:hover,
.tc-colour-chooser a:hover {
	<<.pa0>>
	<<.bw1>>
	border-style: solid;
	border-color: <<colour primary>>;
	background: <<colour primary>>;
}

.tc-image-chooser a svg,
.tc-image-chooser a img {
	display: inline-block;
	width: auto;
	height: auto;
	max-width: 3.5em;
	max-height: 3.5em;
	position: absolute;
	top: 0;
	bottom: 0;
	left: 0;
	right: 0;
}


/* End """ */






/*
** Editor toolbar
** adapted from TW vanilla
** """ 
*/

.tc-editor-toolbar {
	<<.mv2>>
}

.tc-editor-toolbar button {
	vertical-align: middle;
	background-color: <<colour button-background>>;
	fill: <<colour button-foreground>>;
	<<.br2>>
	<<.pa1>>
	<<.mv01>> <<.mr0>> <<.ml1>>
}

.tc-editor-toolbar button.tc-text-editor-toolbar-item-adjunct {
	<<.ml01>>
	<<.br3>>
	width: <<--image-button-width>>;
}

.tc-editor-toolbar button.tc-text-editor-toolbar-item-start-group {
	box-shadow: 1px 1px 2px <<colour tiddler-controls-foreground-selected>>;
}

.tc-editor-toolbar button.tc-selected {
	background-color: <<colour primary>>;
}

.tc-editor-toolbar button svg {
	width: 1.6em;
	height: 1.2em;
}

.tc-editor-toolbar button:hover,
.tc-editor-toolbar .tc-text-editor-toolbar-more button:hover svg {
	background-color: <<colour tiddler-controls-foreground-selected>>;
	fill: <<colour background>>;
}

.tc-editor-toolbar .tc-text-editor-toolbar-more {
	<<.f6>>
	<<.pl3>>
	<<.ml4>>
}

	<<.lh-title>>
	<<.mb2>>
}

	display: inline-block;
	position: absolute;
	left: 1rem;
	<<.pa1>>
	width: auto;
}

	<<.pa0>>
}

.tc-tiddler-preview-preview *:not(h3) + h4, section > h4:first-child { <<.mt4>> }

/*
** Blockquotes using Swiss German Quoting Style
** (c) Thomas Elmiger
** """ 
*/

blockquote, q {
	quotes: "\00AB""\00BB""\2039""\203A";
}

blockquote {
	<<.bl>> <<.bw3>> 
	border-color: <<colour blockquote-bar>>;
	<<.pl3>>
	<<.ml3>>
}

blockquote cite {
	display: inline-block;
	<<.pt2>>
}

blockquote.tc-big-quote {
	font-family: Georgia, serif;
	color: <<--purple>>;
	position: relative;
	background: <<--lightest-blue>>;
	<<.bn>> <<.br4>>
	<<.mv4>> <<.mh3>>
	<<.pa3>> <<.pl4>>
	max-width: 38rem;
}

blockquote.tc-big-quote p { 
	<<.f5>>
	<<.measure>>
}

blockquote.tc-big-quote cite:before {
	content: "\2014 \2009";
}

blockquote.tc-big-quote:before {
	position: absolute;
	top: 1.5rem;
	left: -1.75rem;
	color: <<--dark-pink>>;
	content: open-quote;
	font-size: 6rem;
	line-height: 0.1em;
}

blockquote.tc-big-quote:after {
	position: absolute;
	right: -1.75rem;
	bottom: 3.75rem;
	font-family: Georgia, serif;
	color: <<--dark-pink>>;
	content: close-quote;
	font-size: 6rem;
	line-height: 0.1em;
}

@media (<<--breakpoint-not-small>>) {

blockquote.tc-big-quote {
	<<.bn>> <<.br4>>
	<<.mv4>> <<.mh5>>
	<<.pa3>> <<.pl4>>
}

blockquote.tc-big-quote p { 
	<<.f4>>
}

blockquote.tc-big-quote:before {
	font-size: 9.5rem;
	left: -4rem;
	top: 2rem;
}

blockquote.tc-big-quote:after {
	font-size: 9.5rem;
	right: -4rem;
	bottom: 5.5rem;
}

/* End @media not-small */
}

/* End """ */






/*
** Blockquotes using Swiss German Quoting Style
** (c) Thomas Elmiger
** """ 
*/

blockquote, q {
	quotes: "\00AB""\00BB""\2039""\203A";
}

blockquote {
	<<.bl>> <<.bw3>> 
	border-color: <<colour blockquote-bar>>;
	<<.pl3>>
	<<.ml3>>
}

blockquote cite {
	display: inline-block;
	<<.pt2>>
}

blockquote.tc-big-quote {
	font-family: Georgia, serif;
	position: relative;
	background: <<colour pre-background>>;
	<<.bn>> <<.br4>>
	<<.mv4>> <<.mh3>>
	<<.pa3>> <<.pl4>>
	max-width: 38rem;
	min-height: 6.5rem;
}

blockquote.tc-big-quote p { 
	<<.f5>>
	<<.measure>>
}

blockquote.tc-big-quote cite:before {
	content: "\2014 \2009";
}

blockquote.tc-big-quote:before {
	position: absolute;
	top: 1.5rem;
	left: -1.75rem;
	color: <<colour blockquote-bar>>;
	content: open-quote;
	font-size: 6rem;
	line-height: 0.1em;
}

blockquote.tc-big-quote:after {
	position: absolute;
	right: -1.75rem;
	bottom: 3.75rem;
	font-family: Georgia, serif;
	color: <<colour blockquote-bar>>;
	content: close-quote;
	font-size: 6rem;
	line-height: 0.1em;
}

	<<.bn>> <<.br4>>
	<<.mv4>> <<.mh5>>
	<<.pa3>> <<.pl4>>
}

	<<.f4>>
}

	font-size: 9.5rem;
	left: -4rem;
	top: 2rem;
}

	font-size: 9.5rem;
	right: -4rem;
	bottom: 5.5rem;
}

/* End @media not-small */
}

/* End """ */






/*
** Blockquotes
** (c) Thomas Elmiger
** """ 
*/

blockquote, q {
	quotes: "\201C""\201D""\2018""\2019";
}

blockquote {
	<<.bl>> <<.bw3>> 
	border-color: <<colour blockquote-bar>>;
	<<.pl3>>
	<<.ml3>>
}

blockquote cite {
	display: inline-block;
	<<.pt2>>
}

blockquote.tc-big-quote {
	font-family: Georgia, serif;
	position: relative;
	background: <<colour pre-background>>;
	<<.bn>> <<.br4>>
	<<.mv4>> <<.mh3>>
	<<.pa3>> <<.pl4>>
	max-width: 38rem;
}

blockquote.tc-big-quote p { 
	<<.f5>>
	<<.measure>>
}

blockquote.tc-big-quote cite:before {
	content: "\2014 \2009";
}

blockquote.tc-big-quote:before {
	position: absolute;
	left: -1.2rem;
	top: 2.4rem;
	color: <<colour blockquote-bar>>;
	content: open-quote;
	font-size: 6rem;
	line-height: 0.1em;
}

blockquote.tc-big-quote:after {
	position: absolute;
	right: -1.2rem;
	bottom: -.6rem;
	font-family: Georgia, serif;
	color: <<colour blockquote-bar>>;
	content: close-quote;
	font-size: 6rem;
	line-height: 0.1em;
}

@media (<<--breakpoint-not-small>>) {

blockquote.tc-big-quote {
	<<.bn>> <<.br4>>
	<<.mv4>> <<.mh5>>
	<<.pa3>> <<.pl4>>
}

blockquote.tc-big-quote p { 
	<<.f4>>
}

blockquote.tc-big-quote:before {
	font-size: 9.5rem;
	left: -4.25rem;
	top: 3.25rem;
}

blockquote.tc-big-quote:after {
	font-size: 9.5rem;
	right: -4.25rem;
	bottom: -1.75rem;
}

/* End @media not-small */
}

/* End """ */






/*
** Buttons
** adapted from TW vanilla

* Reset other buttons using this:

	border: none;
	border-radius: 0;
	margin: 0;
	padding: 0;
	background: none;

** """
*/


/* All buttons */

html button {
	cursor: pointer;
	font-size: 1em;
	color: <<colour button-foreground>>;
	background: <<colour button-background>>;
	border-color: <<colour button-border>>;
	<<.ba>>
	<<.br2>>
}

/* Buttons without a class */

button:not([class]), button[class=""] {
	<<.lh-copy>>
	<<.ph2>>
	<<.ba>>
	<<.dim>>
	<<.link-transitions>>
}
button:not([class]):hover, button:not([class]):focus {
	<<.dim-h>>
}
button:not([class]):active {
	<<.dim-a>>
}

/* Most buttons */

.tc-tiddler-info .tc-tab-content button, 
.tc-sidebar-lists .tc-tab-content p > button,
/* next: set password and timestamps */
.tc-sidebar-lists .tc-tab-content p > span:not(.tc-tag-list-item) > button, 
.tc-sidebar-lists .tc-file-input-wrapper button,
.tc-sidebar-lists .tc-popup-keep button,
.tc-add-tag-button button, .tc-edit-field-add-button button {
	<<.br2>> <<.bn>>
	color: <<.black>>;
	background: <<--btn-bg-normal>>;
	text-decoration: none;
	font-weight: 700;
	<<.pv1>> <<.ph3>>
	<<.mr3>>
	min-width: 5rem;
}
.tc-tiddler-info .tc-tab-content button:hover, 
/* .tc-sidebar-lists .tc-tab-content p > button:hover, */
.tc-tab-content p > button:hover,
/* next: set password and timestamps */
.tc-sidebar-lists .tc-tab-content p > span:not(.tc-tag-list-item) > button:hover, 
.tc-sidebar-lists .tc-file-input-wrapper:hover button,
.tc-sidebar-lists .tc-popup-keep:hover button,
.tc-add-tag-button button:hover, .tc-edit-field-add-button button:hover {
	background: <<--btn-bg-hover>>;
}

.tc-add-tag-button button, .tc-edit-field-add-button button {
	<<.f6>>
	<<.pv1>> <<.ph2>>
	<<.mr2>> 
	min-width: 3rem;
}

.tc-sidebar-lists .tc-tab-content p > button, 
/* next: set password and timestamps */

}

/*
** Navigator Plugin – New Button
** (c) Thomas Elmiger
** """ 
*/


#navigator-main button.te-big-new-btn {
   position: fixed;
   z-index: 1201;
   right: 1rem;
   bottom: 0;
   margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
   font-size: 2rem;
   text-align: center;
   line-height:0;
   color: <<colour sidebar-tab-foreground>>;
   border: 1px solid transparent;
   border-radius: 5rem;
   height: 3rem;
   width: 3rem; 
}

#navigator-main button.te-big-new-btn:hover,
#navigator-main button.te-big-new-btn:active,
#navigator-main button.te-big-new-btn:focus {
   background-color: <<colour sidebar-tab-background-selected>>;
   border-color: <<colour sidebar-tab-background>>;
}

#navigator-main button.te-big-new-btn svg.te-new {
   fill: <<colour sidebar-tab-foreground>>;
}

#navigator-main button.te-big-new-btn:hover svg.te-new,
#navigator-main button.te-big-new-btn:active svg.te-new,
#navigator-main button.te-big-new-btn:focus svg.te-new {
   fill: <<colour sidebar-tab-foreground>>;
}

@media (<<--breakpoint-not-small>>) {
	#navigator-main button.te-big-new-btn {
      right: 2rem;
      margin-bottom: 1rem;
      height: 4rem;
      width: 4rem; 
	}
}

@media (<<--breakpoint-medium>>) {
	#navigator-main button.te-big-new-btn {
      right: 2rem;
      margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
      height: 5rem;
      width: 5rem; 
	}
}

@media (<<--breakpoint-large>>) {
	#navigator-main button.te-big-new-btn {
      right: 2rem;
	}

   /* show keyboard hints */

   button .large-screen-only {
      position: absolute;
      right: 3rem;
      width: 20rem; 
      bottom: 0.25rem;
      color: <<colour foreground>>;
   }
}

@media (max-height: 20rem) {
	#navigator-main button.te-big-new-btn {
      height: 3rem;
      width: 3rem; 
	}
}


/* End """ */






/*
** Details and summary
** (c) Thomas Elmiger
** """ 
*/

details .tc-drop-down[hidden="true"] {
	display: none;
}

@media (<<--breakpoint-medium>>) {
	details > span { <<.pv3>> <<.ph4>> }
}


/* End """ */






/*
** Dropdown items
** (c) Thomas Elmiger
** """ 
*/

<$wikify name="bg"text="<<colour dropdown-background>>">
<$wikify name="foreground" text="""<$macrocall $name="contrastcolour" target=<<bg>> fallbackTarget="white" colourA="black" colourB="white"/>""">


/* most dropdowns */

.tc-block-dropdown a,
.tc-drop-down a, .tc-drop-down button,
.tc-drop-down a.tc-tiddlylink,
.tc-drop-down a.tc-tiddlylink-external,
.tc-sidebar-lists .tc-tag-list-item a.tc-tiddlylink,
.tc-search-drop-down .tc-search-results a.tc-tiddlylink,
.tc-advanced-search .tc-edit-type-dropdown a.tc-tiddlylink-missing
{
	<<.pt01>>
	<<.pb1>>
	<<.ph2>>
	<<.mb0>>
	<<.lh-title>>
	display: block;
   width: 100%;
}

.tc-block-dropdown a:hover {
	color: <<colour tiddler-link-background>>;
	background-color: <$macrocall $name=coloraction color=<<colour primary>> mod=brighten value=22/>;
	text-decoration: none;
}


/* sidebar tagpill */

.tc-sidebar-lists .tc-tag-list-item,
.tc-sidebar-lists .tc-drop-down {
	width: 100%;
	max-width: 100%;
}

.tc-sidebar-lists .tc-tag-list-item a.tc-tiddlylink {
	<<.f6>>
	color: <<foreground>>;
	overflow-wrap: break-word;
	max-width: 100%;
}


/* other, tagpill */

.tc-drop-down .tc-dropdown-item,
.tc-block-dropdown .tc-dropdown-item {
	color: <<colour muted-foreground>>;
}

.tc-drop-down .tc-dropdown-item-plain,
.tc-block-dropdown .tc-dropdown-item,
.tc-block-dropdown .tc-dropdown-item-plain .tc-drop-down .tc-dropdown-item {
	<<.pv1>>
	<<.pr3>>
	<<.pl2>>
}


/* color, hover-color */

.tc-drop-down a, .tc-drop-down button,
.tc-drop-down a.tc-tiddlylink,
.tc-drop-down a.tc-tiddlylink-external {
	color: <<foreground>>;
}

.tc-drop-down button svg.tc-image-button,
.tc-drop-down a svg.tc-image-button {
	fill: <<foreground>>;
}

.tc-drop-down a:hover, .tc-drop-down button:hover,
.tc-drop-down .tc-file-input-wrapper:hover button,
.tc-sidebar-lists .tc-tag-list-item a.tc-tiddlylink:hover {
	color: <$macrocall $name=coloraction color=<<bg>> mod=darken value=50/>;
	background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.5);
	text-decoration: none;
}

.tc-drop-down button.tc-btn-invisible:hover svg.tc-image-button {
	fill: <$macrocall $name=coloraction color=<<bg>> mod=darken value=25/>;
}


/* sidebar search */

.tc-search-drop-down .tc-search-results a.tc-tiddlylink:hover {
	color: <$macrocall $name=coloraction color=<<bg>> mod=darken value=25/>;
}


/* advanced search */

.tc-advanced-search .tc-edit-type-dropdown a.tc-tiddlylink-missing {
	color: <<foreground>>;
}

.tc-advanced-search .tc-edit-type-dropdown a.tc-tiddlylink-missing:hover {
	color: <$macrocall $name=coloraction color=<<bg>> mod=darken value=25/>;
	background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.5);
}


</$wikify>
</$wikify>


/* End """ */

** Images and Pictures
** 
** """ 
*/

img { max-width: 100%; }

.tc-bordered-image {
	<<.ba>>
	border-color: <<colour muted-foreground>>;
	padding: 5px;
	margin: 5px;
}

/*
** Links
** adapted from vanilla
** """ 
*/


/* long links should not break the layout */

a {
	overflow-wrap: break-word;
}


/* transitions from tachyons.io */
.tc-tiddlylink, .tc-tiddlylink-external {
	text-decoration: none;
	<<.link-transitions>>
}
.tc-tiddlylink:link, .tc-tiddlylink-external:link, 
.tc-tiddlylink:visited, .tc-tiddlylink-external:visited 
	{ <<.link-transitions>> }
.tc-tiddlylink:hover, .tc-tiddlylink-external:hover
	{ <<.link-transitions>> }
.tc-tiddlylink:active, .tc-tiddlylink-external:active
	{ <<.link-transitions>> }
.tc-tiddlylink:focus, .tc-tiddlylink-external:focus 
	{ <<.link-transitions>> }

button.tc-tiddlylink,
a.tc-tiddlylink {
	text-decoration: none;
	font-weight: normal;
	color: <<colour tiddler-link-foreground>>;
	-webkit-user-select: inherit; /* Otherwise the draggable attribute makes links impossible to select */
}

button.tc-tiddlylink:hover,
a.tc-tiddlylink:hover {
	text-decoration: underline;
}

a.tc-tiddlylink-resolves {
}

a.tc-tiddlylink-shadow {
	font-weight: bold;
}

a.tc-tiddlylink-shadow.tc-tiddlylink-resolves {
	font-weight: normal;
}

a.tc-tiddlylink-missing {
	font-style: italic;
}

a.tc-tiddlylink-external {
	text-decoration: underline;
	color: <<colour external-link-foreground>>;
	background-color: <<colour external-link-background>>;
}

a.tc-tiddlylink-external:visited {
	color: <<colour external-link-foreground-visited>>;
	background-color: <<colour external-link-background-visited>>;
}

a.tc-tiddlylink-external:hover {
	color: <<colour external-link-foreground-hover>>;
	background-color: <<colour external-link-background-hover>>;
}


/* Sidebar */

.tc-sidebar-lists a.tc-tiddlylink {
	<<.f6>>
	<<.lh-title>>
	color: <<colour sidebar-tiddler-link-foreground>>;
/*	overflow-wrap: break-word; */
	max-width: 100%
}

.tc-sidebar-lists .tc-btn-mini + a.tc-tiddlylink {
	<<.mb1>>
}

.tc-sidebar-lists a.tc-tiddlylink:hover,
button.tc-btn-invisible.tc-missing-tiddler-label:hover {
	color: <<colour sidebar-tiddler-link-foreground-hover>>;
}


/* Missing tiddler */

.tc-sidebar-header .tc-missing-tiddler-label {
	<<.f6>>
	<<.lh-title>>
	<<.mb1>>
	color: <<colour sidebar-foreground>>;
	text-align: left;
	font-style: italic;
}

button.tc-btn-invisible.tc-missing-tiddler-label {
	max-width: 100%;
}


/* End """ */






/*
** Lists
** (c) Thomas Elmiger 
** """ 
*/


ul, ol {
	<<.mt3>>
	max-width: 40rem;
}

ul ul, ol ol, ul ol, ol ul {
	<<.mt2>>
}

/* reduce list width? 

.tc-tiddler-body > ul, .tc-tiddler-body > ol {
	<<.measure-wide>>
}

*/

ol li, ul li {
	<<.lh-title>>
}

ol {
	<<.pl4>>
}

ul {
	<<.pl3>>
}

li:first-child {
	<<.mt2>>
}

li:not(:last-child) {
	<<.pb2>>
}


/* End """ */






/*
** Page Controls
** (c) Thomas Elmiger
** """ 
*/

/* Move page controls to right border */

@media (<<--breakpoint-medium>>) {

	.tc-page-controls {
		<<.mt4>> <<.mr0>>	
		position: fixed;
		z-index: 1;
    	right: <<--spacing-m>>;
    	top: 9.66rem;;
    	width: 40px;
    	text-align: right;
	}
	.tc-page-controls button {
		<<.mb2>> <<.mr1>>
	}
	.tc-sidebar-lists {
   	<<.mr5>>
	}

	.tc-page-controls .tc-drop-down {
		margin-left: -20rem;
	}

}

/* End """ */






/*
** Tables
** adapted from vanilla
** """ 
*/

table {
	<<.collapse>>
	<<.ba>>
	border-color: <<--light-gray>>;
	width: auto;
	max-width: 100%;
	caption-side: bottom;
	<<.mb4>>
}

table th {
	text-align: left;
}

tr:nth-child(odd) {
	<<.striped>>
}
tr:nth-child(even) {
	<<.striped2>>
}

table th, table td {
	<<.pv2>>
	<<.ph3>>
}

table thead tr td, table th {
	background-color: <<colour table-header-background>>;
	background-color: <<--light-gray>>;
	font-weight: bold;
}

table tfoot tr td {
	background-color: <<colour table-footer-background>>;
}

.tc-csv-table {
	white-space: nowrap;
}

/* End """ */






/*
** Two Columns
** (c) Thomas Elmiger
** adapted from tachyons.io
** """ 
*/

/*
** clearfix
*/

.cf {
    *zoom: 1;
}

.cf:before, .cf:after {
    content: " ";
    display: table;
}

.cf:after {
    clear: both;
}

.fl {
    float: left;
    _display: inline;
}

.w-100 {
    width: 100%;
}

@media screen and (min-width: 30em) {
    .w-50-ns {
        width: 50%;
    }
}

/* End """ */






/*
** Drag and drop
** taken from vanilla
** """ 
*/

.tc-tiddler-dragger {
	position: relative;
	z-index: -10000;
}

.tc-tiddler-dragger-inner {
	position: absolute;
	top: -1000px;
	left: -1000px;
	display: inline-block;
	padding: 8px 20px;
	font-size: 16.9px;
	font-weight: bold;
	line-height: 20px;
	color: <<colour dragger-foreground>>;
	text-shadow: 0 1px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 1);
	white-space: nowrap;
	vertical-align: baseline;
	background-color: <<colour dragger-background>>;
	border-radius: 20px;
}

.tc-tiddler-dragger-cover {
	position: absolute;
	background-color: <<colour page-background>>;
}

.tc-dropzone {
	position: relative;
}

.tc-dropzone.tc-dragover:before {
	z-index: 10000;
	display: block;
	position: fixed;
	top: 0;
	left: 0;
	right: 0;
	background: <<colour dropzone-background>>;
	text-align: center;
	content: "<<lingo DropMessage>>";
}

.tc-droppable.tc-dragover > .tc-droppable-placeholder {
	display: block;
	border: 2px dashed <<colour dropzone-background>>;
}

.tc-draggable {
	cursor: move;
}

/* End """ */

** """ 
*/

.tc-tags-wrapper,
.tc-subtitle {
   display: none;
}

   margin-top: 2em;
}

   break-inside: avoid;
}

.tc-tiddler-frame:not(:first-of-type) {
   break-before: page;
}

}

/* End """ */

** adapted from TW vanilla
** """ 
*/

.tc-tiddler-frame .tc-tiddler-controls {
   display: none;
}

   break-inside: avoid;
}


/* Title */

body .tc-sidebar-scrollable {
	position: relative;
	top: 0;
	bottom: unset;
	left: 0;
	box-shadow: none;
}

body .tc-sidebar-header > .tc-reveal {
	width: 100%;
	<<.pa0>>
	<<.ma0>>
	<<.mb4>>
	<<.bb>>
	border-color: <<colour tab-border>>;
}


/* Page layout */

body.tc-body {
	background-color: transparent;
}

body .tc-topbar, body .tc-page-controls, body .tc-sidebar-lists {
	display: none;
}

body .tc-story-river {
	margin: 0;
	padding: 0;
}

	margin: 0;
	border: none;
	padding: 0;
}


/* End media query */

}

/* End """ */

   }

/*
** Plugins Checklist
** Optimisations for https://grosinger.net/tw5-checklist/
** (c) Thomas Elmiger
** """ 
*/


input.checklist-newitem { width: calc(100% - 2.75rem - 20px); }

input:focus.checklist-newitem {
    border-bottom: solid 1px <<colour tab-border>>;
}

ul.checklist {
    list-style: none;
}

.checklist > li:hover label, 
.checklist input[type="checkbox"]:hover + button + label, 
.checklist input[type="checkbox"]:focus + button + label  {
    background-color: <<--black .2>>;
}


ul.checklist > li button.checklist-remove:focus,
ul.checklist > li button.checklist-remove:hover {
    border: 1px solid red;
}


/* End """ */






/*
** Sidebar
** (c) Thomas Elmiger 
** """ 
*/


.tc-sidebar-scrollable .my-bookmark {
	color: <$macrocall $name=coloraction color=<<colour sidebar-foreground>> mod=darken value=41/>;
}






\define .shadow-1() box-shadow: 0px 0px 4px 2px rgba( 0, 0, 0, 0.2 );
\define .shadow-2() box-shadow: 0px 0px 8px 2px rgba( 0, 0, 0, 0.2 );
\define .shadow-3(left:"") box-shadow: $left$2px 2px 4px 2px rgba( 0, 0, 0, 0.2 );
\define .shadow-4(left:"") box-shadow: $left$2px 2px 8px 0px rgba( 0, 0, 0, 0.2 );
\define .shadow-5(left:"") box-shadow: $left$4px 4px 8px 0px rgba( 0, 0, 0, 0.2 );
\define .shadow-5-dark(left:"") box-shadow: $left$4px 4px 8px 0px rgba( 0, 0, 0, 0.4 );

\define .dim() opacity: 1; -webkit-transition: opacity .15s ease-in; transition: opacity .15s ease-in;
\define .dim-h() opacity: .5; -webkit-transition: opacity .15s ease-in; transition: opacity .15s ease-in;
\define .dim-a() opacity: .8; -webkit-transition: opacity .15s ease-out; transition: opacity .15s ease-out;

\define .br0() border-radius: 0;
\define .br1() border-radius: .125rem;
\define .br2() border-radius: .25rem;
\define .br3() border-radius: .5rem;
\define .br4() border-radius: 1rem;
\define .br-100() border-radius: 100%;
\define .br-pill() border-radius: 9999px;
\define .br--bottom() border-top-left-radius: 0; border-top-right-radius: 0;
\define .br--top() border-bottom-left-radius: 0; border-bottom-right-radius: 0;
\define .br--right() border-top-left-radius: 0; border-bottom-left-radius: 0;
\define .br--left() border-top-right-radius: 0; border-bottom-right-radius: 0;

\define .ba() border-style: solid; border-width: 1px;
\define .bt() border-top-style: solid; border-top-width: 1px;
\define .br() border-right-style: solid; border-right-width: 1px;
\define .bb() border-bottom-style: solid; border-bottom-width: 1px;
\define .bl() border-left-style: solid; border-left-width: 1px;
\define .bn() border-style: none; border-width: 0;

\define .b--dotted() border-style: dotted;
\define .b--dashed() border-style: dashed;
\define .b--solid() border-style: solid;
\define .b--none() border-style: none;

\define .bw0() border-width: 0;
\define .bw1() border-width: .125rem;
\define .bw2() border-width: .25rem;
\define .bw3() border-width: .5rem;
\define .bw4() border-width: 1rem;
\define .bw5() border-width: 2rem;

\define .bt-0() border-top-width: 0;
\define .br-0() border-right-width: 0;
\define .bb-0() border-bottom-width: 0;
\define .bl-0() border-left-width: 0;

\define .lh-solid() line-height: 1;
\define .lh-title() line-height: 1.25;
\define .lh-copy() line-height: 1.5;

\define .f-headline() font-size: 6rem;
\define .f-subheadline() font-size: 5rem;

\define .f1() font-size: 3rem;
\define .f2() font-size: 2.25rem;
\define .f23() font-size: 1.875rem;
\define .f3() font-size: 1.5rem;
\define .f4() font-size: 1.25rem;
\define .f5() font-size: 1rem;
\define .f6() font-size: .875rem;
\define .f7() font-size: .75rem;

\define .measure() max-width: 30em;
\define .measure-wide() max-width: 34em;
\define .measure-narrow() max-width: 20em;

\define .small-caps() font-variant: small-caps;
\define .truncate() white-space: nowrap; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis;

\define .sans-serif() font-family: 'helvetica neue', helvetica, 'avenir next', avenir, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, ubuntu, roboto, noto, 'segoe ui', arial, sans-serif;
\define .serif() font-family: georgia, times, serif;
\define .system-sans-serif() font-family: sans-serif;
\define .system-serif() font-family: serif;
\define .code() font-family: monaco, Consolas, monospace;
\define .courier() font-family: 'Courier Next', courier, monospace;
\define .helvetica() font-family: 'helvetica neue', helvetica, sans-serif;
\define .avenir() font-family: 'avenir next', avenir, sans-serif;

\define .input-reset() -webkit-appearance: none; -moz-appearance: none;

\define .ws-normal() white-space: normal;
\define .nowrap() white-space: nowrap;
\define .pre() white-space: pre;

\define .w-third() width: calc( 100% / 3 );
\define .w-two-thirds() width: calc( 100% / 1.5 );


<!--

/*
** Backgrounds
*/

/*
  Often used in combination with background image set as an inline style on an html element.
*/
.cover { background-size: cover; }
.contain { background-size: contain; }
.bg-center { background-repeat: no-repeat; background-position: center center; }
.bg-top { background-repeat: no-repeat; background-position: top center; }
.bg-right { background-repeat: no-repeat; background-position: center right; }
.bg-bottom { background-repeat: no-repeat; background-position: bottom center; }
.bg-left { background-repeat: no-repeat; background-position: center left; }

* Boxey, borders and shadows


/* Clearfix */
/* Nicolas Gallaghers Clearfix solution
   Ref: http://nicolasgallagher.com/micro-clearfix-hack/ */
.cf:before, .cf:after { content: " "; display: table; }
.cf:after { clear: both; }
.cf { *zoom: 1; }
.cl { clear: left; }
.cr { clear: right; }
.cb { clear: both; }
.cn { clear: none; }

/* MAX WIDTHS */
.mw-none { max-width: none; }
.mw1 { max-width: 1rem; }
.mw2 { max-width: 2rem; }
.mw3 { max-width: 4rem; }
.mw4 { max-width: 8rem; }
.mw5 { max-width: 16rem; }
.mw6 { max-width: 32rem; }
.mw7 { max-width: 48rem; }
.mw8 { max-width: 64rem; }
.mw9 { max-width: 96rem; }
.mw-100 { max-width: 100%; }


!!! TYPE SCALE
/* For Hero Titles */
.f-headline and .f-subheadline 
/* Type Scale */
.f1 to .f7
/* Small and hard to read for many people so use with extreme caution */

!!! TYPOGRAPHY
* .measure is ~66 characters (30em)
* .measure wide ~80 characters (34em)
* .measure narrow ~45 characters (20em)

/* Book paragraph style - paragraphs are indented with no vertical spacing. */
.indent { text-indent: 1em; margin-top: 0; margin-bottom: 0; }
.small-caps { font-variant: small-caps; }
/* Combine this class with a width to truncate text (or just leave as is to truncate at width of containing element. */
.truncate { white-space: nowrap; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis; }


!!! UTILITIES
.overflow-container { overflow-y: scroll; }
.center { margin-right: auto; margin-left: auto; }

/* VISIBILITY */
/* Text that is hidden but accessible
    Ref: http://snook.ca/archives/html_and_css/hiding-content-for-accessibility */
.clip { position: fixed !important; _position: absolute !important; 
clip: rect( 1px 1px 1px 1px ); /* IE6, IE7 */ 
clip: rect( 1px, 1px, 1px, 1px ); }


!!! HOVER EFFECTS
Docs: http://tachyons.io/docs/themes/hovers/
* Dim
** Dim element on hover using the dim class.
* Hide Child
* Underline text
* Grow
* Pointer
* Shadow

/* Hide child & reveal on hover:
  Put the hide-child class on a parent element and any nested element with the
  child class will be hidden and displayed on hover or focus.

  <div class="hide-child">
    <div class="child"> Hidden until hover or focus </div>
    <div class="child"> Hidden until hover or focus </div>
    <div class="child"> Hidden until hover or focus </div>
    <div class="child"> Hidden until hover or focus </div>
  </div>
*/
.hide-child .child { opacity: 0; -webkit-transition: opacity .15s ease-in; transition: opacity .15s ease-in; }
.hide-child:hover  .child, .hide-child:focus  .child, .hide-child:active .child { opacity: 1; -webkit-transition: opacity .15s ease-in; transition: opacity .15s ease-in; }
.underline-hover:hover, .underline-hover:focus { text-decoration: underline; }

/* Can combine this with overflow-hidden to make background images grow on hover
 * even if you are using background-size: cover */
.grow { -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale; -webkit-backface-visibility: hidden; backface-visibility: hidden; -webkit-transform: translateZ( 0 ); transform: translateZ( 0 ); -webkit-transition: -webkit-transform .25s ease-out; transition: -webkit-transform .25s ease-out; transition: transform .25s ease-out; transition: transform .25s ease-out, -webkit-transform .25s ease-out; }
.grow:hover, .grow:focus { -webkit-transform: scale( 1.05 ); transform: scale( 1.05 ); }
.grow:active { -webkit-transform: scale( .90 ); transform: scale( .90 ); }
.grow-large { -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale; -webkit-backface-visibility: hidden; backface-visibility: hidden; -webkit-transform: translateZ( 0 ); transform: translateZ( 0 ); -webkit-transition: -webkit-transform .25s ease-in-out; transition: -webkit-transform .25s ease-in-out; transition: transform .25s ease-in-out; transition: transform .25s ease-in-out, -webkit-transform .25s ease-in-out; }
.grow-large:hover, .grow-large:focus { -webkit-transform: scale( 1.2 ); transform: scale( 1.2 ); }
.grow-large:active { -webkit-transform: scale( .95 ); transform: scale( .95 ); }


/* Add shadow on hover.
   Performant box-shadow animation pattern from 
   http://tobiasahlin.com/blog/how-to-animate-box-shadow/ 
*/
.shadow-hover::after { box-shadow: 0 0 8px 2px rgba( 0, 0, 0, .2 ); opacity: 0; -webkit-transition: opacity .25s ease-in-out; transition: opacity .25s ease-in-out; }
.shadow-hover:hover::after, .shadow-hover:focus::after { opacity: 1; }

/* Combine with classes in skins and skins-pseudo for 
 * thousands of different transition possibilities. */
.bg-animate, .bg-animate:hover, .bg-animate:focus { -webkit-transition: background-color .15s ease-in-out; transition: background-color .15s ease-in-out; }

-->

<!-- !! Ice Cream Theme
(c) Thomas Elmiger – inspired by tachyons.io

!!! Constants (variables) for stylesheets

!!!! Tachyons hints

* Tachyons provides classes to set text at three common line-height values. 1.5 for body copy, 1.25 for titles, and 1 for text that doesn't wrap.
* Monospaced Typefaces (for code) from http://cssfontstack.com

-->






\define --dark-red() #e7040f
\define	--red() #ff4136
\define	--light-red() #ff725c
\define	--orange() #ff6300
\define	--gold() #ffb700
\define	--yellow() #ffde37
\define	--light-yellow() #fbf1a9
\define --purple() #5e2ca5
\define --light-purple() #a463f2
\define --dark-pink() #d5008f
\define --hot-pink() #ff41b4
\define	--pink() #ff80cc
\define	--light-pink() #ffa3d7
\define --dark-green() #137752
\define	--green() #19a974
\define	--light-green() #9eebcf
\define --navy() #001b44
\define --dark-blue() #00449e
\define --blue() #357edd
\define --light-blue() #96ccff
\define	--lightest-blue() #cdecff
\define --washed-blue() #f6fffe
\define	--washed-green() #e8fdf5
\define	--washed-yellow() #fffceb
\define --washed-red() #ffdfdf

\define --black(opacity:1) rgba(0,0,0,$opacity$)
\define --white(opacity:1) rgba(255,255,255,$opacity$)

\define --light-gray() rgba(0,0,0,0.125)
\define --ultralight-gray() rgba(0,0,0,0.03)
\define --silver-gray() rgba(0,0,0,0.08)

\define --near-black() #111
\define --dark-gray() #333
\define --mid-gray() #555
\define --light-slategray() #789
\define --near-white() #f4f4f4

\define --te-almost-white(4%BlackCover) #F7F7F7
\define --te-gray-2(%BlackCover) #222
\define --te-gray-4(79%BlackCover) #444
\define --te-gray-6(%BlackCover) #666
\define --te-gray-8(54%BlackCover) #888
\define --te-gray-a(%BlackCover) #aaa
\define --te-gray-b(32%BlackCover) #bbb
\define --te-gray-c(24%BlackCover) #ccc

\define --btn-normal() rgba(99,99,99,.1)
\define --btn-hover() rgba(99,99,99,.3)

\define --btn-bg-normal(color:"0,0,0") linear-gradient(to bottom,<<--btn-normal>> 0,rgba($color$,.125) 100%)
\define --btn-bg-hover() linear-gradient(to bottom,<<--btn-hover>> 0,<<--btn-hover>> 100%)

\define .collapse() border-collapse: collapse; border-spacing: 0;
\define .striped() background-color: <<--silver-gray>>;
\define .striped2() background-color: <<--ultralight-gray>>;

\define --spacing-none(-:"") 0
\define --spacing-xxs(-:"") .125rem
\define --spacing-xs(-:"") .25rem
\define --spacing-s(-:"") .5rem
\define --spacing-m(-:"") 1rem
\define --spacing-l(-:"") 2rem
\define --spacing-xl(-:"") 4rem
\define --spacing-xxl(-:"") 8rem
\define --spacing-xxxl(-:"") 16rem

\define .pa0(-:"") padding: $-$<<--spacing-none>>;
\define .pa01(-:"") padding: $-$<<--spacing-xxs>>;
\define .pa1(-:"") padding: $-$<<--spacing-xs>>;
\define .pa2(-:"") padding: $-$<<--spacing-s>>;
\define .pa3(-:"") padding: $-$<<--spacing-m>>;
\define .pa4(-:"") padding: $-$<<--spacing-l>>;
\define .pa5(-:"") padding: $-$<<--spacing-xl>>;
\define .pa6(-:"") padding: $-$<<--spacing-xxl>>;
\define .pa7(-:"") padding: $-$<<--spacing-xxxl>>;

\define .pl0(-:"") padding-left: $-$<<--spacing-none>>;
\define .pl01(-:"") padding-left: $-$<<--spacing-xxs>>;
\define .pl1(-:"") padding-left: $-$<<--spacing-xs>>;
\define .pl2(-:"") padding-left: $-$<<--spacing-s>>;
\define .pl3(-:"") padding-left: $-$<<--spacing-m>>;
\define .pl4(-:"") padding-left: $-$<<--spacing-l>>;
\define .pl5(-:"") padding-left: $-$<<--spacing-xl>>;
\define .pl6(-:"") padding-left: $-$<<--spacing-xxl>>;
\define .pl7(-:"") padding-left: $-$<<--spacing-xxxl>>;

\define .pr0(-:"") padding-right: $-$<<--spacing-none>>;
\define .pr01(-:"") padding-right: $-$<<--spacing-xxs>>;
\define .pr1(-:"") padding-right: $-$<<--spacing-xs>>;
\define .pr2(-:"") padding-right: $-$<<--spacing-s>>;
\define .pr3(-:"") padding-right: $-$<<--spacing-m>>;
\define .pr4(-:"") padding-right: $-$<<--spacing-l>>;
\define .pr5(-:"") padding-right: $-$<<--spacing-xl>>;
\define .pr6(-:"") padding-right: $-$<<--spacing-xxl>>;
\define .pr7(-:"") padding-right: $-$<<--spacing-xxxl>>;

\define .pb0(-:"") padding-bottom: $-$<<--spacing-none>>;
\define .pb01(-:"") padding-bottom: $-$<<--spacing-xxs>>;
\define .pb1(-:"") padding-bottom: $-$<<--spacing-xs>>;
\define .pb2(-:"") padding-bottom: $-$<<--spacing-s>>;
\define .pb3(-:"") padding-bottom: $-$<<--spacing-m>>;
\define .pb4(-:"") padding-bottom: $-$<<--spacing-l>>;
\define .pb5(-:"") padding-bottom: $-$<<--spacing-xl>>;
\define .pb6(-:"") padding-bottom: $-$<<--spacing-xxl>>;
\define .pb7(-:"") padding-bottom: $-$<<--spacing-xxxl>>;

\define .pt0(-:"") padding-top: $-$<<--spacing-none>>;
\define .pt01(-:"") padding-top: $-$<<--spacing-xxs>>;
\define .pt1(-:"") padding-top: $-$<<--spacing-xs>>;
\define .pt2(-:"") padding-top: $-$<<--spacing-s>>;
\define .pt3(-:"") padding-top: $-$<<--spacing-m>>;
\define .pt4(-:"") padding-top: $-$<<--spacing-l>>;
\define .pt5(-:"") padding-top: $-$<<--spacing-xl>>;
\define .pt6(-:"") padding-top: $-$<<--spacing-xxl>>;
\define .pt7(-:"") padding-top: $-$<<--spacing-xxxl>>;

\define .pv0(-:"") padding-top: $-$<<--spacing-none>>; padding-bottom: $-$<<--spacing-none>>;
\define .pv01(-:"") padding-top: $-$<<--spacing-xxs>>; padding-bottom: $-$<<--spacing-xxs>>;
\define .pv1(-:"") padding-top: $-$<<--spacing-xs>>; padding-bottom: $-$<<--spacing-xs>>;
\define .pv2(-:"") padding-top: $-$<<--spacing-s>>; padding-bottom: $-$<<--spacing-s>>;
\define .pv3(-:"") padding-top: $-$<<--spacing-m>>; padding-bottom: $-$<<--spacing-m>>;
\define .pv4(-:"") padding-top: $-$<<--spacing-l>>; padding-bottom: $-$<<--spacing-l>>;
\define .pv5(-:"") padding-top: $-$<<--spacing-xl>>; padding-bottom: $-$<<--spacing-xl>>;
\define .pv6(-:"") padding-top: $-$<<--spacing-xxl>>; padding-bottom: $-$<<--spacing-xxl>>;
\define .pv7(-:"") padding-top: $-$<<--spacing-xxxl>>; padding-bottom: $-$<<--spacing-xxxl>>;

\define .ph0(-:"") padding-left: $-$<<--spacing-none>>; padding-right: $-$<<--spacing-none>>;
\define .ph01(-:"") padding-left: $-$<<--spacing-xxs>>; padding-right: $-$<<--spacing-xxs>>;
\define .ph1(-:"") padding-left: $-$<<--spacing-xs>>; padding-right: $-$<<--spacing-xs>>;
\define .ph2(-:"") padding-left: $-$<<--spacing-s>>; padding-right: $-$<<--spacing-s>>;
\define .ph3(-:"") padding-left: $-$<<--spacing-m>>; padding-right: $-$<<--spacing-m>>;
\define .ph4(-:"") padding-left: $-$<<--spacing-l>>; padding-right: $-$<<--spacing-l>>;
\define .ph5(-:"") padding-left: $-$<<--spacing-xl>>; padding-right: $-$<<--spacing-xl>>;
\define .ph6(-:"") padding-left: $-$<<--spacing-xxl>>; padding-right: $-$<<--spacing-xxl>>;
\define .ph7(-:"") padding-left: $-$<<--spacing-xxxl>>; padding-right: $-$<<--spacing-xxxl>>;

\define .ma0(-:"") margin: $-$<<--spacing-none>>;
\define .ma01(-:"") margin: $-$<<--spacing-xxs>>;
\define .ma1(-:"") margin: $-$<<--spacing-xs>>;
\define .ma2(-:"") margin: $-$<<--spacing-s>>;
\define .ma3(-:"") margin: $-$<<--spacing-m>>;
\define .ma4(-:"") margin: $-$<<--spacing-l>>;
\define .ma5(-:"") margin: $-$<<--spacing-xl>>;
\define .ma6(-:"") margin: $-$<<--spacing-xxl>>;
\define .ma7(-:"") margin: $-$<<--spacing-xxxl>>;

\define .ml0(-:"") margin-left: $-$<<--spacing-none>>;
\define .ml01(-:"") margin-left: $-$<<--spacing-xxs>>;
\define .ml1(-:"") margin-left: $-$<<--spacing-xs>>;
\define .ml2(-:"") margin-left: $-$<<--spacing-s>>;
\define .ml3(-:"") margin-left: $-$<<--spacing-m>>;
\define .ml4(-:"") margin-left: $-$<<--spacing-l>>;
\define .ml5(-:"") margin-left: $-$<<--spacing-xl>>;
\define .ml6(-:"") margin-left: $-$<<--spacing-xxl>>;
\define .ml7(-:"") margin-left: $-$<<--spacing-xxxl>>;

\define .mr0(-:"") margin-right: $-$<<--spacing-none>>;
\define .mr01(-:"") margin-right: $-$<<--spacing-xxs>>;
\define .mr1(-:"") margin-right: $-$<<--spacing-xs>>;
\define .mr2(-:"") margin-right: $-$<<--spacing-s>>;
\define .mr3(-:"") margin-right: $-$<<--spacing-m>>;
\define .mr4(-:"") margin-right: $-$<<--spacing-l>>;
\define .mr5(-:"") margin-right: $-$<<--spacing-xl>>;
\define .mr6(-:"") margin-right: $-$<<--spacing-xxl>>;
\define .mr7(-:"") margin-right: $-$<<--spacing-xxxl>>;

\define .mb0(-:"") margin-bottom: $-$<<--spacing-none>>;
\define .mb01(-:"") margin-bottom: $-$<<--spacing-xxs>>;
\define .mb1(-:"") margin-bottom: $-$<<--spacing-xs>>;
\define .mb2(-:"") margin-bottom: $-$<<--spacing-s>>;
\define .mb3(-:"") margin-bottom: $-$<<--spacing-m>>;
\define .mb4(-:"") margin-bottom: $-$<<--spacing-l>>;
\define .mb5(-:"") margin-bottom: $-$<<--spacing-xl>>;
\define .mb6(-:"") margin-bottom: $-$<<--spacing-xxl>>;
\define .mb7(-:"") margin-bottom: $-$<<--spacing-xxxl>>;

\define .mt0(-:"") margin-top: $-$<<--spacing-none>>;
\define .mt01(-:"") margin-top: $-$<<--spacing-xxs>>;
\define .mt1(-:"") margin-top: $-$<<--spacing-xs>>;
\define .mt2(-:"") margin-top: $-$<<--spacing-s>>;
\define .mt3(-:"") margin-top: $-$<<--spacing-m>>;
\define .mt4(-:"") margin-top: $-$<<--spacing-l>>;
\define .mt5(-:"") margin-top: $-$<<--spacing-xl>>;
\define .mt6(-:"") margin-top: $-$<<--spacing-xxl>>;
\define .mt7(-:"") margin-top: $-$<<--spacing-xxxl>>;

\define .mv0(-:"") margin-top: $-$<<--spacing-none>>; margin-bottom: $-$<<--spacing-none>>;
\define .mv01(-:"") margin-top: $-$<<--spacing-xxs>>; margin-bottom: $-$<<--spacing-xxs>>;
\define .mv1(-:"") margin-top: $-$<<--spacing-xs>>; margin-bottom: $-$<<--spacing-xs>>;
\define .mv2(-:"") margin-top: $-$<<--spacing-s>>; margin-bottom: $-$<<--spacing-s>>;
\define .mv3(-:"") margin-top: $-$<<--spacing-m>>; margin-bottom: $-$<<--spacing-m>>;
\define .mv4(-:"") margin-top: $-$<<--spacing-l>>; margin-bottom: $-$<<--spacing-l>>;
\define .mv5(-:"") margin-top: $-$<<--spacing-xl>>; margin-bottom: $-$<<--spacing-xl>>;
\define .mv6(-:"") margin-top: $-$<<--spacing-xxl>>; margin-bottom: $-$<<--spacing-xxl>>;
\define .mv7(-:"") margin-top: $-$<<--spacing-xxxl>>; margin-bottom: $-$<<--spacing-xxxl>>;

\define .mh0(-:"") margin-left: $-$<<--spacing-none>>; margin-right: $-$<<--spacing-none>>;
\define .mh01(-:"") margin-left: $-$<<--spacing-xxs>>; margin-right: $-$<<--spacing-xxs>>;
\define .mh1(-:"") margin-left: $-$<<--spacing-xs>>; margin-right: $-$<<--spacing-xs>>;
\define .mh2(-:"") margin-left: $-$<<--spacing-s>>; margin-right: $-$<<--spacing-s>>;
\define .mh3(-:"") margin-left: $-$<<--spacing-m>>; margin-right: $-$<<--spacing-m>>;
\define .mh4(-:"") margin-left: $-$<<--spacing-l>>; margin-right: $-$<<--spacing-l>>;
\define .mh5(-:"") margin-left: $-$<<--spacing-xl>>; margin-right: $-$<<--spacing-xl>>;
\define .mh6(-:"") margin-left: $-$<<--spacing-xxl>>; margin-right: $-$<<--spacing-xxl>>;
\define .mh7(-:"") margin-left: $-$<<--spacing-xxxl>>; margin-right: $-$<<--spacing-xxxl>>;


<!-- !! Bricks Theme: Tachyons SPACING
(c) Thomas Elmiger – inspired by tachyons.io – implemented as macro definitions

Negative values: just put a - (minus sign) in your macro call. Where you would use `mln1` in original tachyons, just write `<<ml1 ->>` to get the inverted value of `<<ml1>>`.

!!! Constants (variables) for stylesheets

!!!! Tachyons hints for SPACING and Variables

Docs: http://tachyons.io/docs/layout/spacing/

!!!!! Scale
Powers of two scale ranging from 0 to 16rem. Additional .125rem step inserted by @telmiger. 

* 0 --spacing-none(-:"") 0
* 01 --spacing-xxs(-:"") .125rem
* 1 --spacing-xs(-:"") .25rem
* 2 --spacing-s(-:"") .5rem
* 3 --spacing-m(-:"") 1rem
* 4 --spacing-l(-:"") 2rem
* 5 --spacing-xl(-:"") 4rem
* 6 --spacing-xxl(-:"") 8rem
* 7 --spacing-xxxl(-:"") 16rem

!!!!! Base:
* p = padding
* m = margin

!!!!! Modifiers:
* a = all
* h = horizontal
* v = vertical
* t = top
* r = right
* b = bottom
* l = left

!!!!! Spacing steps
* 0 = none
* 01= additional xxs-step in spacing scale
* 1 = 1st step in spacing scale
* 2 = 2nd step
* 3 = 3rd step
* 4 = 4th step
* 5 = 5th step
* 6 = 6th step
* 7 = 7th step

(Media Query Extensions not implemented.)

-->






\define .link-transitions() transition: color .15s ease-in, text-decoration .15s ease-in, background-color .15s ease-in;


<!--

!! Transitions
* links

-->






\define --root-font-size() {{$:/themes/telmiger/bricks/metrics/fontsize}}

\define --code-font() {{$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/settings/codefontfamily}}

\define --image-button-height() 1em
\define --image-button-width() 1em

\define --sidebar-width() 26rem
\define --tiddler-view-frame-width() 54rem

\define --breakpoint-not-small() min-width: 28rem
\define --breakpoint-medium() min-width: 42rem
\define --breakpoint-large() min-width: 77rem


<!-- 82 / tiddler-view-frame-width() 26rem

!! Constants (variables)

!!! Measures
* root font size (rem base)
* code font families
* tc-image-button
* widths of sidebar, storyriver and content
* breakpoints
* spacing (distances): see [[$:/themes/telmiger/minimal/tachyons-spacing]]

-->






\define overlay(selector:"html",color:"#000",opacity:".1",more:"",width:"100%",height:"100%")
<$wikify name="more" text="$more$">

$selector$ { position: relative; }

$selector$::before {
	background-color: $color$;
	content: "";
	position: absolute;
	top: 0; left: 0;
	width: $width$;
	height: $height$;  
	opacity: 0; 
	<<more>>
}

$selector$:hover::before, $selector$:focus::before { opacity: $opacity$; }

</$wikify>
\end

<!-- !! Color Overlay Hack
Generates a piece of CSS

* overlay(selector:"html",color:"#000",opacity:".1",more:"",width:"100%",height:"100%")
** the more parameter is wikified, so you can add tachyon variables

!!! Examples

```
<$macrocall $name="overlay" selector=".tc-tag-label" color="#000" opacity=".075" more="<<.br4>>",width:"calc(100% - 1rem)",height:"100%"/>
```

`<<overlay ".tc-tag-label">>`

-->






/*
** Custom Background
** same as in vanilla
** """ 
*/

\define custom-background-datauri()
<$set name="background" value={{$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/settings/backgroundimage}}>
<$list filter="[<background>is[image]]">
`background: url(`
<$list filter="[<background>!has[_canonical_uri]]">
<$macrocall $name="datauri" title={{$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/settings/backgroundimage}}/>
</$list>
<$list filter="[<background>has[_canonical_uri]]">
<$view tiddler={{$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/settings/backgroundimage}} field="_canonical_uri"/>
</$list>
`) center center;`
`background-attachment: `{{$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/settings/backgroundimageattachment}}`;
-webkit-background-size:` {{$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/settings/backgroundimagesize}}`;
-moz-background-size:` {{$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/settings/backgroundimagesize}}`;
-o-background-size:` {{$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/settings/backgroundimagesize}}`;
background-size:` {{$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/settings/backgroundimagesize}}`;`
</$list>
</$set>
\end

/* End """ */






/*
** Thumbnail macros
** taken from vanilla
** """ 
*/

.tc-thumbnail-wrapper {
	position: relative;
	display: inline-block;
	margin: 6px;
	vertical-align: top;
}

.tc-thumbnail-right-wrapper {
	float:right;
	margin: 0.5em 0 0.5em 0.5em;
}

.tc-thumbnail-image {
	text-align: center;
	overflow: hidden;
	border-radius: 3px;
}

.tc-thumbnail-image svg,
.tc-thumbnail-image img {
	filter: alpha(opacity=1);
	opacity: 1;
	min-width: 100%;
	min-height: 100%;
	max-width: 100%;
}

.tc-thumbnail-wrapper:hover .tc-thumbnail-image svg,
.tc-thumbnail-wrapper:hover .tc-thumbnail-image img {
	filter: alpha(opacity=0.8);
	opacity: 0.8;
}

.tc-thumbnail-background {
	position: absolute;
	border-radius: 3px;
}

.tc-thumbnail-icon svg,
.tc-thumbnail-icon img {
	width: 3em;
	height: 3em;
	<<filter "drop-shadow(2px 2px 4px rgba(0,0,0,0.3))">>
}

.tc-thumbnail-wrapper:hover .tc-thumbnail-icon svg,
.tc-thumbnail-wrapper:hover .tc-thumbnail-icon img {
	fill: #fff;
	<<filter "drop-shadow(3px 3px 4px rgba(0,0,0,0.6))">>
}

.tc-thumbnail-icon {
	position: absolute;
	top: 0;
	left: 0;
	right: 0;
	bottom: 0;
	display: -webkit-flex;
	-webkit-align-items: center;
	-webkit-justify-content: center;
	display: flex;
	align-items: center;
	justify-content: center;
}

.tc-thumbnail-caption {
	position: absolute;
	background-color: #777;
	color: #fff;
	text-align: center;
	bottom: 0;
	width: 100%;
	filter: alpha(opacity=0.9);
	opacity: 0.9;
	line-height: 1.4;
	border-bottom-left-radius: 3px;
	border-bottom-right-radius: 3px;
}

.tc-thumbnail-wrapper:hover .tc-thumbnail-caption {
	filter: alpha(opacity=1);
	opacity: 1;
}


/* End """ */






/*
** Table of contents
** adapted from TW vanilla
** """ 
*/

.tc-sidebar-lists .tc-table-of-contents {
	white-space: nowrap;
}

.tc-table-of-contents button {
	color: <<colour sidebar-foreground>>;
}

.tc-table-of-contents svg {
	width: 0.7em;
	height: 0.7em;
	vertical-align: middle;
	fill: <<colour sidebar-foreground>>;
}

.tc-table-of-contents ol {
	list-style-type: none;
	padding-left: 0;
}

.tc-table-of-contents ol ol {
	padding-left: 1em;
}

.tc-table-of-contents li {
	font-size: 1.0em;
	font-weight: bold;
}

.tc-table-of-contents li a {
	font-weight: bold;
}

.tc-table-of-contents li li {
	font-size: 0.95em;
	font-weight: normal;
	line-height: 1.4;
}

.tc-table-of-contents li li a {
	font-weight: normal;
}

.tc-table-of-contents li li li {
	font-size: 0.95em;
	font-weight: 200;
	line-height: 1.5;
}

.tc-table-of-contents li li li li {
	font-size: 0.95em;
	font-weight: 200;
}

.tc-tabbed-table-of-contents {
	display: -webkit-flex;
	display: flex;
}

.tc-tabbed-table-of-contents .tc-table-of-contents {
	z-index: 100;
	display: inline-block;
	padding-left: 1em;
	max-width: 50%;
	-webkit-flex: 0 0 auto;
	flex: 0 0 auto;
	background: <<colour tab-background>>;
	border-left: 1px solid;
	border-top: 1px solid;
	border-bottom: 1px solid;
	border-color: <<colour tab-border>>;
}

.tc-tabbed-table-of-contents .tc-table-of-contents .toc-item > a,
.tc-tabbed-table-of-contents .tc-table-of-contents .toc-item-selected > a {
	display: block;
	padding: 0.12em 1em 0.12em 0.25em;
}

.tc-tabbed-table-of-contents .tc-table-of-contents .toc-item > a {
	border-top: 1px solid;
	border-left: 1px solid;
	border-bottom: 1px solid;
	border-color: <<colour tab-background>>;
}

.tc-tabbed-table-of-contents .tc-table-of-contents .toc-item > a:hover {
	text-decoration: none;
	border-top: 1px solid;
	border-left: 1px solid;
	border-bottom: 1px solid;
	border-color: <<colour tab-border>>;
	background: <<colour tab-border>>;
}

.tc-tabbed-table-of-contents .tc-table-of-contents .toc-item-selected > a {
	border-top: 1px solid;
	border-left: 1px solid;
	border-bottom: 1px solid;
	border-color: <<colour tab-border>>;
	background: <<colour background>>;
	margin-right: -1px;
}

.tc-tabbed-table-of-contents .tc-table-of-contents .toc-item-selected > a:hover {
	text-decoration: none;
}

.tc-tabbed-table-of-contents .tc-tabbed-table-of-contents-content {
	display: inline-block;
	vertical-align: top;
	padding-left: 1.5em;
	padding-right: 1.5em;
	border: 1px solid;
	border-color: <<colour tab-border>>;
	-webkit-flex: 1 0 50%;
	flex: 1 0 50%;
}

/* End """ */






/*
** Tree macro
** adapted from TW vanilla 5.1.17
** """ 
*/

.tc-tree div {
   padding-left: 14px;
}

.tc-tree ol {
   list-style-type: none;
   padding-left: 0;
   margin-top: 0;
}

.tc-tree ol ol {
   padding-left: 1em;
}

.tc-tree button {
   color: #acacac;
}

.tc-tree svg {
   fill: #acacac;
}

.tc-tree span svg {
   width: 1em;
   height: 1em;
   vertical-align: baseline;
}

.tc-tree li span {
   color: lightgray;
}

/* End """ */






\define if-editor-height-fixed(then,else)
<$reveal state="$:/config/TextEditor/EditorHeight/Mode" type="match" text="fixed">
$then$
</$reveal>
<$reveal state="$:/config/TextEditor/EditorHeight/Mode" type="match" text="auto">
$else$
</$reveal>
\end

/*
** Styles containing Wikilogic
** inspired by TW vanilla
** """ 
*/

html {
	font-size: {{$:/themes/telmiger/bricks/metrics/fontsize}};
}

/*
** no-sidebar rules – mostly from .../002-page.css
*/

@media (<<--breakpoint-medium>>) {

<<if-no-sidebar "

	body .tc-tiddler-view-frame, body .tc-tiddler-frame.tc-tiddler-edit-frame {
		margin-right: auto;
	}

	body .tc-tiddler-frame.tc-tiddler-edit-frame {
		margin-right: 2rem;
	}

">>
}


@media (<<--breakpoint-large>>) {

<<if-no-sidebar "

	body .tc-story-river {
		margin-right: auto;
		padding-right: 2rem;
	}

	body .tc-tiddler-frame {
		margin-right: auto;
	}

">>
}


/*
** from .../components/tiddler.css
*/

<$reveal state="$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/options/stickytitles" type="match" text="yes">
.tc-tiddler-title {
	position: -webkit-sticky;
	position: -moz-sticky;
	position: -o-sticky;
	position: -ms-sticky;
	position: sticky;
	top: 0px;
	margin-right: 0rem;
	margin-left: -1rem;
	padding-right: 4rem;
	padding-left: 1rem;
	min-width: calc(100% + 2rem);
	z-index: 300;
	background: <<colour tiddler-background>>;
	border-bottom: 1px solid <<colour tab-divider>>;
}

@media (<<--breakpoint-not-small>>) {
	.tc-tiddler-title {
		margin-right: 0rem;
		margin-left: -1rem;
		padding-right: 2rem;
		padding-left: 1rem;
		min-width: calc(100% + 2rem);
	}
}

@media (<<--breakpoint-medium>>) {
	.tc-tiddler-title {
		padding-right: 1rem;
	}
}
</$reveal>


/*
** from .../edit/tiddler.css
*/

textarea.tc-edit-texteditor {
	font-family: {{$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/settings/editorfontfamily}};
}

<<if-editor-height-fixed then:"""

body .tc-tiddler-preview-preview {
	overflow-y: scroll;
	height: {{$:/config/TextEditor/EditorHeight/Height}};
}

""">>


/* End """ */






\define --breakpoint-not-small() min-width: 28rem
\define --breakpoint-medium() min-width: 42rem
\define --breakpoint-large() min-width: 77rem
\define if-editor-height-fixed(then,else)
<$reveal state="$:/config/TextEditor/EditorHeight/Mode" type="match" text="fixed">
$then$
</$reveal>
<$reveal state="$:/config/TextEditor/EditorHeight/Mode" type="match" text="auto">
$else$
</$reveal>
\end

/*
** Styles containing Wikilogic
** inspired by TW vanilla
** """ 
*/

html {
	font-size: {{$:/themes/telmiger/bricks/metrics/fontsize}};
}

/*
** no-sidebar rules – mostly from .../001-page.css
*/

@media (<<--breakpoint-medium>>) {

<<if-no-sidebar "

	body .tc-tiddler-view-frame, body .tc-tiddler-frame.tc-tiddler-edit-frame {
		margin-right: auto;
	}

	body .tc-tiddler-frame.tc-tiddler-edit-frame {
		margin-right: 2rem;
	}

">>
}


@media (<<--breakpoint-large>>) {

<<if-no-sidebar "

	body .tc-story-river {
		margin-right: auto;
		padding-right: 2rem;
	}

	body .tc-tiddler-frame {
		margin-right: auto;
	}

">>
}


/*
** from .../components/tiddler.css
*/

<$reveal state="$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/options/stickytitles" type="match" text="yes">
.tc-tiddler-title {
	position: -webkit-sticky;
	position: -moz-sticky;
	position: -o-sticky;
	position: -ms-sticky;
	position: sticky;
	top: 0px;
	margin-right: 0rem;
	margin-left: -1rem;
	padding-right: 4rem;
	padding-left: 1rem;
	min-width: calc(100% + 2rem);
	z-index: 300;
	background: <<colour tiddler-background>>;
	border-bottom: 1px solid <<colour tab-divider>>;
}

@media (<<--breakpoint-not-small>>) {
	.tc-tiddler-title {
		margin-right: 0rem;
		margin-left: -1rem;
		padding-right: 2rem;
		padding-left: 1rem;
		min-width: calc(100% + 2rem);
	}
}

@media (<<--breakpoint-medium>>) {
	.tc-tiddler-title {
		padding-right: 1rem;
	}
}
</$reveal>


/*
** from .../edit/tiddler.css
*/

textarea.tc-edit-texteditor {
	font-family: {{$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/settings/editorfontfamily}};
}

<<if-editor-height-fixed then:"""

body .tc-tiddler-preview-preview {
	overflow-y: scroll;
	height: {{$:/config/TextEditor/EditorHeight/Height}};
}

""">>


/* End """ */
